alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Lyon (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 16 at 12:28PM EST until February 16 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Some area roads will remain flooded early this afternoon. * WHERE...Portions of southern Illinois and western Kentucky, including the following counties, in southern Illinois, Massac and Pope. In western Kentucky, Caldwell, Crittenden, Hopkins, Livingston, Lyon, Marshall and Webster. * WHEN...Until 215 PM CST. * IMPACTS...It will take several hours for all the water from the earlier storms to work through local drainage systems in urban areas, and to recede from roads in more rural areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1126 AM CST, Scattered showers will be possible early this afternoon. - Additional rainfall amounts of a half inch or less are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Madisonville, Princeton, Benton, Providence, Marion, Dawson Springs, Calvert City, Eddyville, Land Between The Lakes Area, Earlington, Clay, Mortons Gap, Dixon, Salem, Farmersville, Creswell, Olney, Ledbetter, Kuttawa and Fredonia.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
